metadata.title: CVE-2021-22095 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Spring AMQP versions 2.2.0 - 2.2.19 and 2.3.0 - 2.3.11, the Spring AMQP Message object, in its toString() method, will create a new String object from the message body, regardless of its size. This can cause an OOM Error with a large message

criterions.comment: spring package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
